member.name: T:System.Text.Formatting.StringBuffer
member.summary: A low-allocation version of the built-in type.

member.name: M:System.Text.Formatting.StringBuffer.AppendFormat``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Appends the string returned by processing a composite format string, which contains zero or more format items, to this instance. Each format item is replaced by the string representation of a single argument.

member.name: M:System.Text.Formatting.StringBuffer.Format``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Converts the value of objects to strings based on the formats specified and inserts them into another string.

member.summary: Specifies an interface for types that act as a set of formatting arguments.

member.summary: The number of arguments in the set.

member.name: T:System.Text.Formatting.IStringFormattable
member.summary: Defines an interface for types that can be formatted into a string buffer.
